biotools.summary: Alternative basecaller for improving the quality and read length of Sanger DNA sequencing traces. The basecaller works with trace files produced by the ABI 310, 3700, 3100, 3130, 3730, and 3500 DNA sequencers. MegBACE sequencers are also supported.

bioschemas.name: PeakTrace
bioschemas.summary: Alternative basecaller for improving the quality and read length of Sanger DNA sequencing traces. The basecaller works with trace files produced by the ABI 310, 3700, 3100, 3130, 3730, and 3500 DNA sequencers. MegBACE sequencers are also supported.
